## Stanford
List found at : [AI catalog](http://ai.stanford.edu/)

Silvio Savarese
[Webpage](http://cvgl.stanford.edu/silvio/)
INterests: Computer vision, robotics
Lab affiliation: [SVL](http://svl.stanford.edu/)

Feifei Li
[Webpage](http://vision.stanford.edu/feifeili/)
Interests: Computer vision
Lab affiliation: [SVL](http://svl.stanford.edu/)

Emma Brunskill
[Webpage](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~ebrun/)
Interests: Reinforcement learning and interactive learning
Lab affiliation:

Juan Carlos Niebles
[Webpage](http://www.niebles.net/)
Interests: Computer vision, autonomous driving
Lab affiliation: [SVL](http://svl.stanford.edu/)

Dorsa Sadigh
[Webpage](https://dorsa.fyi/)
Interests: Interactive autonomous systems
Lab affiliation: [Iliad lab](http://iliad.stanford.edu/)

Leonidas J. Guibas
[Webpage](https://geometry.stanford.edu/member/guibas/)
Lab affiliation: Leonidas Guibas Lab

Jeanette Bohg
[Webpage](https://am.is.tuebingen.mpg.de/person/jbohg)
Lab affiliation:

Sebastian Thrun
[Webpage](http://robots.stanford.edu/)
Interests: AI for healthcare, AI for people-prediction, smart homes
lab affiliation: The Thrun lab

Chris Manning
[Webpage](https://nlp.stanford.edu/manning/)
Interests: NLP, NLU, Universal Depencencies, Language Learning through interaction, Deep learning
Lab affiliation: [Stanford NLP group](http://nlp.stanford.edu/)

Dan Jurafsky
[Webpage](https://web.stanford.edu/~jurafsky/)
Interests: NLP, applications in cognitive and social sciences
Lab affiliation: [Stanford NLP group](http://nlp.stanford.edu/)

## MIT
List found at: [CSAIL catalog](https://www.csail.mit.edu/people?person%5B0%5D=role%3A299)

William Freeman
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/william-freeman)
[Website](https://billf.mit.edu/)
Interests: Vision, machine learning, Bayesian modeling
Lab affiliation: [Vision Group](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/vision-group), [Computer Graphics Group](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/computer-graphics-group)
Email: billf@csail.mit.edu

Leslie Kaelbling
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/leslie-kaelbling)
[Website](http://people.csail.mit.edu/lpk/)
Interests: Situated agents (?), Mobile robotics, RL, decision-theoretic planning. 
Lab affiliation: [Learning and Intelligent Systems](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/learning-and-intelligent-systems) [Machine Learning](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/machine-learning)
Email: lpk@csail.mit.edu

Julie Shah 
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/julie-shah)
Interests: Human-guided Transfer for robot learning, Human-Robot interaction
Lab affiliation: [Interactive Robotics Group](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/interactive-robotics-group)
Email: julie_a_shah@csail.mit.edu

Tomas Lozano-Perez
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/tomas-lozano-perez)
[Website](http://people.csail.mit.edu/tlp/)
Interests: Configuration-space approach to motion planning (Robotics), Computer vision (interpretation-tree approach to object recognition), machine learning (multiple-instance learning)
Lab affiliation: [Learning and Intelligent Systems](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/learning-and-intelligent-systems)
Email: tlp@csail.mit.edu

Tomasco Poggio
__heavyweight__
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/tomaso-poggio)
[Lab Website](http://cbmm.mit.edu/)
Interests: Machine Learning, Neural science and Robotics
Lab affiliation: [Center for Brains, Minds and Machines](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/center-brains-minds-and-machines) (_he's the lead for this one_)
Email: tp@csail.mit.edu

Stefanie Mueller
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/stefanie-mueller)
[Website](http://www.stefaniemueller.org/)
Interests: Advanced personal fabrication technologies (3d printer)
Lab affiliation: [HCI Engineering group](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/hci-engineering-group), [Human-Computer Interaction](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/human-computer-interaction)
Email: stefanie.mueller@mit.edu

Antonio Torralba
**Carl Vondrick's PHD advisor**
_did some work on attention prediction, could be interesting to talk to_
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/antonio-torralba)
[Website](http://web.mit.edu/torralba/www//)
Interests: Computer vision, multi-modal learning
Lab affiliation: [Vision Group](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/vision-group), [Computer Graphics Group](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/computer-graphics-group)
Email: torralba@csail.mit.edu

Joshua Tenenbaum
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/joshua-tenenbaum)
[Website](http://web.mit.edu/cocosci/josh.html)
Interests: Machine learning, coming close to human learning abilities. Driven by appraoch to better understand human learning. 
Lab affiliation: [Center for Brains, Minds and Machines](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/center-brains-minds-and-machines), [Computational Cognitive Science Group](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/computational-cognitive-science-group)(_he's the lead for this one_)
Email: jbt@csail.mit.edu

Brian Williams
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/brian-williams)
[Website](http://people.csail.mit.edu/williams/Web%20site/williams.shtml)
Interests: long-living autonomous systems, realization of "common sense" reasoning
Lab affiliation: [Model-based embedded and robotics systems group](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/model-based-embedded-and-robotics-systems-group)
Email: williams@csail.mit.eduon/

Regina Barzilay
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/regina-barzilay)
Interests: NLP, ML
Lab affiliation: [Natural Language Processing Group](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/natural-language-processing-group)
Email: regina@csail.mit.edu

Ruth Rosenholtz
[Info](https://www.csail.mit.edu/person/ruth-rosenholtz)
Interests: Computer vision and user interfaces. Preattentive texture processing, visual search and __visual saliency__ and perceptual organization.
Lab affiliation: [Vision Group](https://www.csail.mit.edu/research/vision-group)
Email: rruth@csail.mit.edu

## CMU
List found at: [Robotics Institute](https://ai.cs.cmu.edu/faculty-listing#department-robotics-institute), [Machine Learning Department](https://ai.cs.cmu.edu/faculty-listing#department-machine-learning-department), [Language Technologies Institute](https://ai.cs.cmu.edu/faculty-listing#department-language-technologies-institute)

[Website](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~ninamf/)
Interests: Interactive learning, Lifelong learning and metalearning.

Geoffrey Gordon
[Website](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~ggordon/)
Interests: multi-agent planning, reinforcement learning, decision-theoretic planning
Lab affiliation: SELECT Lab
Email: ggordon@cs.cmu.edu

Manuela M Veloso
[Website](https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~mmv/)
Interests: Multi-robotic.

Henny Admoni
[Website](http://hennyadmoni.com/)
Interests: Robot helping humans on complex task. human-robot interaction
Lab affiliation: [Human and Robot Partners (HARP) Lab](http://harp.ri.cmu.edu/)
Email: henny@cmu.edu

Christopher G. Atkeson affiliation
[Website](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~cga/)
Interests: Robotics, Machine Learning, Learning from demonstraition, RL
Email: cga@cmu.edu

Andrew Bagnell
[Website](https://www.ri.cmu.edu/ri-people/j-andrew-drew-bagnell/)
INterests: AI reasoning, learning and classification
Fernando De la Torre Frade
Abhinav Gupta
David Held

Jeff Schneider
